DataElement.preferredName: Cognitive Function Auditory Continuous Performance Test Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Of or being or relating to or involving cognition._The normal action performed by a structure or device._A test designed to identify auditory attention deficits. The test requires that a subject listen to a list of single words and respond when hearing the targeted word. The test can aid in the diagnosis of ADD or ADHD in children 6 through 11._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
